name: Publicly Accessible RDS Instances
query: { dbInstances( where: { cloudProvider: "aws" publiclyAccessible: true dbCluster: null securityGroups_SOME: { rules_SOME: { direction: "Inbound" OR: [ { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0" } ] } } } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
